import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; function HilightingSection() { const {user} = useSelector(store=> store.auth); const [query, setQuery] = useState(); return (
Welcome, {user?.fullname}!
Your ideal job is waiting for you.
Search, Apply &
Get Your Dream Job
setQuery(e.target.value)} />
); } export default HilightingSection;
